OrgName: Triad Digital Media LLC d/b/a Triad Retail Media
activities: Triad Digital Media LLC may receive a number of different types of data, including the following: (1) data from its EU based companies to carry out its obligations under employment and benefit laws, to administer employee participation in its benefit, compensation and human resources plans and programs, for performance management and for compliance and discipline reporting and investigation; (b) data from client customers, including, but not limited to, purchasers of clients' products and/or services, consumer research participants, and consumers interacting with clients' or affiliates' product and/or services promotions; (c) data related to shareholders of Triad Digital Media LLC and/or any of its affiliates;  and(d) data related to business customers or vendors of Triad Digital Media or any of its affiliates.
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually-processed, customer and supplier data, human resources data, business contact data
recoursemech: Triad Digital Media LLC agrees to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities to investigate unresolved complaints concerning human resources data and the American Arbitration Association American Arbitration Association ("AAA") (International Centre for Dispute Resolution (“ICDR”) to investigate other types of unresolved complaints.
